text: 'This is the least authentic

text: 'Average food that made my boyfriend and I sick and overpriced. I recommend going elsewhere!'

text: 'I tried the veggie tacos! They are loaded

author: Eddie Gonzalez
text: 'OMG I came back today for the third day in a row and tried their shrimp burrito dinner plate  and was not shocked at how Fresh and Great flavor it had. I was totally not disappointed and recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for original Cali/Mex flavored food.'

author: John
text: 'Very overpriced. Food is pretty bland and tasteless. Order has been wrong 3/3 times I ordered from there. Never again.'

author: Lisa Hoskins
text: 'Great tacos and burritos. I recommend the Bay Burrito.'

author: Rosanna Terrero
text: 'If your looking for good Mexican food you should order The food is very good and they have fast delivery. I recommend to go because it‚Äôs not a place where you can sit comfortably it‚Äôs not very big. Overall they have good food and fast service.'

author: Jelly p
text:
"You ever ate something that put you in a bad mood?
Well if thats what you're looking for come here.

This was bland and cold.. how? I picked it up almost as soon as I ordered it..
I ordered a steak burrito and was served a rice and bean burrito with rice and beans on the side."

author: April Lancona
text: 'The best quesadilla in Hoboken!! I swear I crave their quesadilla every week
column5: need to get it at least once a week! Also their homemade salsa has the perfect amount of spice
column6: I order extra to dip tortillas into throughout the week. I love you Hoboken burrito'

author: Mr. C
text: "I will never order from this place again. They are way overpriced and they don't even give you a lot of food. I ordered the grilled steak taco meal and they only give you two tacos. That is unheard of any restaurant you go to where you order a meal of tacos you always get three. I felt so ripped off I will never order from this place again that's what happens when you have Chinese people making Mexican food"

text: 'Save the money. If your looking for similar quality just order a bunch of Taco Bell.'

author: Johnny Angel
text: 'Great burritos! Good price.'

author: Kyle Gheewala
text: 'This place has the worst mexican food I have ever had. DO NOT GO HERE. There is nothing special about the food. I ordered a grilled chicken burrito and when i picked it up to eat
column5: the entire wrap fell apart and the insides spilled out. When i asked the manager for a refund he had horrible customer service and decided to pick a fight over $9. I will never go back to this place because of their service and bad quality.'

author: Giorgio Rosi
text: 'The food is really good. This is one of the only places in the area that the chicken on the chicken nachos is actually made on a slow cooker so they put pin strips of soft slow cooked chicken instead of your traditional just cubes of solid chicken. The burritos are really good too.'

text: 'Best salads ever'

author: Ervin M Ventura
text: 'Lunch special steak burrito is tasty and fresh. The steak well seasoned and pico de gallo
column5: rice and beans tasted homemade. The lady in the front a little rude. A bit expensive for the portion.'

author: Briana Diaz
text: 'If i had to choose between qdoba
column7: i would most definitely choose hoboken burrito . I have never tasted such great mexican food in my life. My friends
column8: family and myself have been coming here for years now and its nothing but tasty
column10: amazing food . I totally recommend this place if you are craving some mexican food üíØüíØüíØoralewayyyyyyy'

author: Jaquiria Abreu
text: 'BESTMEXICAN FOOD IVE EVER HAD!!! I definitely recommend this place. The service is awesome too!'

author: Kelly Greene
text: "Several of my friends warned me about this place because of food poisoning
column5: but I was nearby and craving Mexican. HUGE mistake. I counted at least 4 cockroaches scurrying around the stools
column6: and 1 crawling up the counter. Obviously I left as soon as I saw this. The health department needs to shut this place down.\n\nEdit: The owner response was all you needed to see. The audacity and disrespectfulness of calling out a patron and implying they're lying because
column8: anything that isn't favorable toward them must be fabricated. Also
column9: I have no idea why they assumed that the day they saw my review was the day I went there. They think every review is a witchhunt for them and not a platform to give honest feedback for other consumers. Absolutely pathetic."

author: Fam Vids
text: "I've gotten food from here TWICE and both times I've gotten food poisoning from here. It was awful
column5: and the staff is even worse. They are extremely rude and unprofessional."

author: Lorelei Morrow
text: "Ordered this food with my boyfriend - wanted Mexican food but didn't want to make it.  The food was delivered promptly
column5: and made well.  It's a mix between Mexican Mexican food and Americanized Mexican food - and the burrito was (not kidding) 5 pounds at least. Best Mexican around? No. But definitely works! ;)"

author: Andy
text: 'This is a terrible place. Both my wife and I got HORIFFIC food poisoning from this place. Never would I tell anyone to eat here. We were violently ill for 2 days because of the food.'

author: Mohini Merchant
text: "They closed 45 minutes early.  Literally 45 minutes early!!!!! I'm outside at the moment
column5: terrible service.  They weren't event apologetic. Heard this place sucks but I was going to give it a chance.  Bad idea
column6: don't go here they certainly don't care at all about their customers."

author: Paul Lichstein
text: 'A little over priced.  Originally this place was very Cal-mex however over the last 5 or 6 it has become more generic Mexican.  Chicken mole is very good.  Portions are better than fresca tortilla and the taco truck. . They do have Mexican coke and jarritos (Mexican sodas made by coke in Mexico) .  This place does not really shine on anything but nothing they do is bad.  On a pretty day you should walk to Jersey City Heights for genuine oxxacan food.  When you are feeling lazy order from here.'

author: The Corcoran Group
text: "Don't let the exterior fool you
column5: this place has some of the best Mexican food in town
column6: especially paired with one of their eclectic soft drink choices. We always go for the vegetarian Mission Burrito"

author: Nick Walker
text: "Food is usually pretty good by delivery
column5: although expensive. They do have Mexican Coke as well. I just wish when I order Guacamole they would send me something that wasn't a container full of diced tomatoes with a little avocado in it. Avocado is supposed to be the primary ingredient in guacamole!"

author: Matthew Hartsough
text: 'Food is good enough. Too expensive to go back though.'
